original_solution_mapping.L1: 40% of the marbles are of other colors because 100 - 20 - 40 = <<100-20-40=40>>40
original_solution_mapping.L2: The friend will on average get 2 other colored marbles because 5 x .4 = <<5*.4=2>>2

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5016.
    Returns: the average number of marbles of other colors the friend will get.
    """
    # L1
    total_percentage = 100 # WK
    black_percent = 20 # 20% are black
    clear_percent = 40 # 40% of them are clear
    other_colors_percent = total_percentage - black_percent - clear_percent

    # L2
    marbles_taken = 5 # take five marbles
    other_colors_decimal = 0.4 # 40% as a decimal, derived from the remainder of colors
    average_other_colors_marbles = marbles_taken * other_colors_decimal

    # FA
    answer = average_other_colors_marbles
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: {other_colors_percent}% of the marbles are of other colors because {total_percentage} - {black_percent} - {clear_percent} = <<{total_percentage}-{black_percent}-{clear_percent}={other_colors_percent}>>{other_colors_percent}

The friend will on average get {average_other_colors_marbles} other colored marbles because {marbles_taken} x {other_colors_decimal} = <<{marbles_taken}*{other_colors_decimal}={average_other_colors_marbles}>>{average_other_colors_marbles}

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: 40% of the marbles are of other colors because 100 - 20 - 40 = <<100-20-40=40>>40
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: The friend will on average get 16 other colored marbles because 40 x 0.4 = <<40*0.4=16>>16

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'clear_percent' (40) was used instead of 'marbles_taken' (5).
